token.La route du bonheur est un jeu de sociét: The Road to Happiness is a board game created by the OECD. The aim is to enable teachers to introduce children aged 9 to 11 to the question of well-being, in a fun and educational way through learning through play.
token.Tout au long du jeu, les enfants réponde: Throughout the game, children answer questions, express their opinions on well-being and select the most important topics for them so that they can create their own Living Better Indicator.
token.Afin de jouer à La Route du Bonheur, vou: In order to play La Route du Bonheur, you download and print these elements
token.Des histoires pour connaître les élément: Stories to know the elements of well-being
